properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Avai vali vali nivalinda
chayo chavo muvudiku.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Valola uvulavu,
vulavu vunene mno
Vamanya nivaitia ligali
Engelosi yaloleka kuvo.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Valola engerengere
yokagenya muluvega,
lwe vugwe.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Valola umwana na mama
weve nivamuha vihanwa.
